description:
This additional content includes:

- Musical Pose Set (3 types)

With a song and a dance, you can turn any place into an impromptu theater!

Enjoy communicating with other hunters and taking fun photos with these special gestures!

- After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. Gestures can be used from the Chat Menu Menu or from the Pose Menu in the Camera option.
name: Musical Pose Set
